result.arabic_text: ۞ وَعَنَتِ ٱلۡوُجُوهُ لِلۡحَيِّ ٱلۡقَيُّومِۖ وَقَدۡ خَابَ مَنۡ حَمَلَ ظُلۡمٗا
result.translation: Ibiremwa bizokwicisha bugufi kuri Nyenubugingo budashira nk’uko buyikwiye, Umuhagarikizi w’ibiremwa Yikwije muri vyose. Ni ukuri kuri uwo musi, uwiremetse irenganya ry’ibangikanyamana azohahombera koko.
